name: Apathy In Our Stars
description:
After being in cryogenic storage for 18,000 years, re-emerge into the galaxy and try to make a name for yourself! Buy your freedom, upgrade your ship, and save the galaxy from an all consuming hive mind! And maybe even more...

Discover what the Tretsi look like! Why have the humans formed an alliance with a Spider race? Who keeps breaking the galactic speed limit near Rehbe? And why not get married while you're out and about in Juxin?

Inspired by Star Trader and Star Control 2, explore the galaxy and find all it has to offer!

  • 14 aliens to meet and talk with
  • 5 different ships
  • 14 upgrades to buy and 26 to earn in quests
  • 9 main quests and 20 side quests
  • 22 enemies to fight
  • 3 varied endings
  • 80,000 words of dialogue
  • 24 unique songs
  • Supports cloud saves, and can transfer save data between phone and PC

100% free and done as a hobby project!
